title: Bug 47910 - ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc to compile with the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar,' an output file is created with a .jar extension, but it lacks a valid MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: The generated .jar file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file, making it an invalid jar file.
EB: The expected behavior is that when using the 'outjar' parameter, the resulting .jar file should include a valid MANIFEST.MF file.
SR: To reproduce the issue, execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar' and observe that the generated .jar file does not have a MANIFEST.MF file.
